Posts.Title: Do rads harm saline implants? LMGLMT LMGLMT

Posts.Content: LMGLMT wrote: 5 years ago I had saline implants put in.   Last month I was diagnosed with DCIS stage 0.The first surgeon I consulted with said that I should opt for mastectomy because implants and rads don't mix- it will make them hardened and deformed.    I got a 2nd opinion from another surgeon and consulted a rad oncologist. Both happened to be women and both said they didn't believe that I would necessarily have a problem if I chose lumpectomy and rads. I understand that the surgery and rads will make my breast smaller and there is a chance of scar tissue developing but I want to know what will happen to the implant itself. Either way, I scheduled lumpectomy for July 8th.  If margins aren't clear then I will rethink my decision.  Wondering if anyone has had rads with implants and what your experience was? Dx 5/10/2010, DCIS, Stage 0, Grade 3 Log in to post a reply
